p: DENV is transmitted to humans by mosquitoes ( Aedes aegypti and A. albopictus). A. aegypti can pick up DENV from people showing no symptoms or oligosymptom, resulting in silent transmission [ 11]. A positive association was established between DENV infection in humans and mosquitoes at very fine spatiotemporal scales in the natural setting; specifically, human cases were reported at about one week after positive A. aegypti in one study [ 12, 13].
